thread.title: OFFICIAL: Real Madrid are the best goal scorers in football history - and here's the proof
thread.title_full: OFFICIAL: Real Madrid are the best goal scorers in football history - and here's the proof

author: Jon Moody
title: OFFICIAL: Real Madrid are the best goal scorers in football history - and here's the proof
text:
Not bad, we're sure you'll agree. But now they've also got something else to celebrate - a world record, no less. Raise your left arm if you love Cristiano Ronaldo (Photo: Denis Doyle) 
Ronaldo's bullet header equaliser in Real's dramatic 2-1 victory over Betis meant they became the first team EVER to score in 48 consecutive matches, surpassing the previous record of 47 set by Benfica over 50 years ago. 
The gloss to the newly-set record was added by Sergio Ramos' late winner in their crucial fixture. "I love knee slides... w !" (Photo: Helios de la Rubia) 
Benfica's run of 47 was achieved between December 1963 and January 1965, but the history books will now have Los Blancos' run from April 2016 and counting at the top of the pile.
